snippet: The chip maker Intel slashed nearly $1 billion from its first-quarter revenue forecast as small businesses put off upgrading their personal computers.
abstract: Intel forecasts first-quarter revenue of $12.8 billion, 7 percent, or almost $1 billion, lower than previous forecast.
lead_paragraph: The chip maker Intel slashed nearly $1 billion from its first-quarter revenue forecast as small businesses put off upgrading their personal computers.

headline.main: Shares of Intel Drop After It Lowers Its Forecast
headline.print_headline: Shares of Intel Drop After It Lowers Its Forecast
